Package JavaCool303

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Cool303Component
    Interface for all components of JavaCool303
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AppTest
    Sample application that uses JavaCool303
    Cool303Button
    Cool303Button is a JButton that a Cool303Theme can be applied to
    Cool303Container
    Container is an invisible box It also has an optional string
    Cool303Root
    Is a JPanel that applies given theme to all its children
    Cool303Theme
    Abstract Theme class, that can be extended by complete Themes
    PastelTheme
    Pastel theme Has different colors and fonts for Cool303Components
    WinterTheme
    WinterTheme has different properties for the Cool303Components
